originalText.text: Appointment with Dr.Tun. I am black. I have an appointment. I give them my information. I fill out the forms. I show up early. But the doctor does not see me. They have me wait for an hour even though I'm early for my appointment.

text.text: Appointment with Dr.Tun. I am black. I have an appointment. I give them my information. I fill out the forms. I show up early. But the doctor does not see me. They have me wait for an hour even though I'm early for my appointment.

originalText.text: Dr. Paganos is the best there is - super friendly and extremely knowledgeable. I was able to leave with comfort in an effective treatment. One other plus was the expedited wait time in reception. I was seen moments after checking in! 5+ stars

text.text: Dr. Paganos is the best there is - super friendly and extremely knowledgeable. I was able to leave with comfort in an effective treatment. One other plus was the expedited wait time in reception. I was seen moments after checking in! 5+ stars

originalText.text:
I would not recommend anyone to go here. I went here 3 times and then had to find a new doctor. Here's the heads-up:

- Wait time is 45-60 minutes, the doctor will spend less than 10 minutes with you before sending you on your way

- I had to get a prescription for a topical knee ointment at my 2nd appointment. I picked it up from my pharmacy and applied it as I was told. Only to feel burning on my skin. I called the Dr and explained the situation and was told, OOPS we ordered the wrong prescription for you. Tell that to the scar on my knee

- I received a statement from my insurance after my first 2 visits saying that my copay was lower than what I was charged. I realized that the office overcharged me $20 on my first 2 visits. So for my 3rd visit I asked them to credit my account and that I would pay the difference at my next appointment. They told me that they don't deal with that, so I called their billing representative. He told me that since I already payed he would not resubmit the claim. Then they threatened to take me to a collections agency if I didn't pay for the 3rd visit, despite having overpaid the first 2 times

There are many good doctors and specialists in NY. Do NOT settle for a bad experience.

originalText.text: Dr. Panagos is a class act—always staying up on the latest developments to help his patients. He has a warm spirit and incredible bedside manner. He is an extremely patient and kind doctor whose judgment I trust.

text.text: Dr. Panagos is a class act—always staying up on the latest developments to help his patients. He has a warm spirit and incredible bedside manner. He is an extremely patient and kind doctor whose judgment I trust.

originalText.text: I arrived in so much pain that I couldn't move, sleep or think.  Dr. Panagos controlled the pain and prescribed physical therapy, which he monitored.  He spent time offering detailed knowledge that helped with recovery.  Through the course of therapy the pain diminished and normal movement returned.  I have a greater understanding of the problem and an arsenal of exercises to mitigate or even prevent future occurrences.
